detailed_results.question: What is the opportunity cost?

• The value of the next best alternative forgone.
• The cash flow forgone if a unit of a resource is used on a project instead of in the best alternative way.
• The sales proceeds of CU13,600 (in this case).
• The value in use of an asset if it is not sold or used for another purpose.

In other words, opportunity cost is the loss of potential benefits that could have been earned by using resources in the most valuable way possible.
